Description: In anticipation of International Women‚Äôs Day, we have a sweet treat coming your wayyyüç≠. Are you ready for our 5th Edition of Real Talks all about gender equity and neurodiversity? Get ready to explore the intersection of these topics and challenge the common misconceptions surrounding women with neurodivergent traitsüíñ. Often, these traits are mistakenly perceived as personality quirks rather than recognised as part of a broader neurological spectrum üåà. Together, let‚Äôs all dive into the complexities of navigating biases associated with both gender and neurology. Whether you agree, disagree, or prefer to remain Switzerland, we welcome you to join us for an engaging conversation. In partnership with The Social Hub Amsterdam City, we're thrilled to offer this opportunity to connect and learn togetherüí° üßèüèº For who? Anyone who is graduating or already employed (0-5 yr), and allies and people in the advertising industry who have a seat at the table üìÜ When? March 14th, 19:00 üìçWhere? @ The Social Hub Amsterdam City Wibautstraat 129, 1091GL üéüÔ∏è tickets? ‚Ç¨5 (excluding transactional costs) See you there! Special notice: Should you be observing Ramadan, kindly send us an email at hi@we-are-raw.com, as we are keeping you in our thoughts during the evening.
Title: Real Talks #5 | Neurodiversity Through The Lens of Women in Advertising
Subtitle: Come broaden this perspective on neurodivergence.

Description: The Kult is getting bigger. We're adding more specials, more one-hours, more works-in-progress, more everything. Get set for the first of many Kult specials by the uber-talented Emma Dalenberg on her Spring Tour. Kult Comedy proudly presents The American Cream. The American Cream, with Emma Dalenberg ‚ÄúQueer liberals view guns, the same way conservatives view queer liberals. You‚Äôre so against it, but then you find one in your hands, and you‚Äôre just like, oh‚Ä¶this ain‚Äôt too bad.‚Äù Emma has a love/hate relationship with the country that raised her. While working at the infamous Mall of America, the mecca of American capitalism, Emma sat around and dreamed of a different kind of America, where conservatives and queers shoot guns together, women get free abortions in churches, and poor white people finally realize that rich white people have never had their backs.¬† About Emma Dalenberg: A real heavy hitter, measuring up at 183 cm tall, Emma Dalenberg is a seasoned American comic, that approaches her sets with good vibes and a genuine love to connect with audiences of all backgrounds. She has toured all over the United States and through 5 European countries, at venues ranging from packed theaters and clubs to small-town dive bars and bowling alleys. She is a paid regular at the nationally renowned Acme Comedy Club, was voted 'Racket Magazine‚Äôs 2022 Minnesota Comic to Watch,‚Äô is twice featured in the Minnesota Star Tribune, has opened for Michael Che, Dave Attell, and Big Jay Oakerson, and most impressively, nearly got deported from Germany in December of 2022. Now, Emma is focused on developing her act across the country and returning to Europe for her ‚ÄúAmerican Cream‚Äù Tour. Emma is proud to have come up from her Midwestern trailer park beginnings and be a broke world traveler, with a good handful of subversive jokes, goofy stories, and intercultural observations to share.
Title: Kult Comedy Presents - The American Cream by Emma Dalenberg
Subtitle: Upcoming American Standup - comedy star Emma Dalenberg is bringing her first solo hour "The American Cream" to Amsterdam!

Description: March Topic - Bring AI into Production Title: Practical MLOps: best practices and an interactive example with UbiOps After tackling some MLOps best practices and common pitfalls, we will walk through an interactive example together. In this hands-on workshop, you'll learn how to deploy and run Stable Diffusion with the UbiOps platform. UbiOps is a serverless platform for AI & ML models, built to help data science teams transition their proof of concepts to fully operational models running at scale. During the workshop we will show you how you can work with both the UbiOps WebApp and Python client. Python knowledge + your laptop is all you need! Speaker profile: Anouk is the Head of Product at UbiOps. She studied Nanobiology and Computer Science at the Delft University of Technology, and did a Master‚Äôs in Game Development at Falmouth University. Her background sparked her interest in Machine Learning. Next to her role at UbiOps, she also frequently writes for Towards Data Science about various MLOps topics and she co-hosts the biggest Dutch data podcast, de Dataloog. Her efforts in tech have been awarded twice with the T500 award, in both 2020 and 2021. Every 2nd Thursday of the month we organise a WAI Circle where we connect and share knowledge. Our Circles are hosted at the Equals Clubhouse in Amsterdam. They are the heartbeat of our WAI community. It is all about ambitious women that want to grow, support, and empower each other. If you or anyone you know would be interested in speaking at our WAI Circles please share the link: https://womeninai.nl/circle-speaker-request/ No refunds on tickets, all sales are final. **Please note that pictures and videos could be taken at our events for use by WAI Netherlands. We use this information for the purpose of WAI Netherlands event and program marketing.**
Title: WAI Circle: March Edition
Subtitle: Bring AI into Production

Hun hedendaagse Odyssee voert hen door de verstikkende woestijn en over de onstuimige zee. Description: (Bilingual workshop taught in a combination of Dutch and English.) A limited number of subsidized spots are available for kids from low-income families with a Stadspas. *** During this NewTechKids 'Try It Out' workshop held at the Amsterdam Public Library near Centraal Station, kids ages 8-12 will be introduced to designing, building and coding robots and tech prototypes. space, etc. Girls and boys with little or no previous experience with robotics and coding are welcome! Kids will dive into building and visual programming using LEGO Mindstorms and art supplies. They'll learn about design concepts (resources, requirements, testing, iteration, best practices) and computer science concepts (coding, algorithms, commands, loops, sequence, iteration, if-else logic, etc.). During the workshop, they‚Äôll discuss inspiring examples of technology before completing a class challenge in pairs and presenting their prototypes. The workshop will take place on Thursday, March 14, 2024 from 16:30 - 18:00. This bilingual workshop will be taught by a native Dutch-speaking professional teacher with specialised training in computer science. The workshop's curriculum is based on NewTechKids‚Äô pedagogy which focuses on concept-context learning and the use of tangible learning tools. Our workshop is ideal for children with no previous exposure to design and computer science and those who have previously participated in NewTechKids programs. Girls are welcome! A minimum of 16 students is required to offer this workshop. Registrants will be notified 3 days prior if the workshop is cancelled and a full refund will be provided. Location: OBA Centraal, Oosterdokskade 143 in the Junior Lab (basement)
Title: NewTechKids 'Try It Out' Workshop at OBA Centraal: March 14, 2024
Subtitle: 'Try It Out' workshop during which kids ages 8-12 design, build and program robots and tech prototypes. Taught in both Dutch and English.

Description: Hey AIC Members! Feel like a kid again! Every second Thursday of the month we're gathering a group of internationals and locals for one hour of trampoline dodgeball and more wild fun. What to bring Wear clothes that are easy to move in and be prepared for a little sweat as 60 minutes of jumping and moving is an awesome workout! Important to know - Our 1 hour jump time will be reserved for our group in the cafe for drinks and snacks before and after. - Special socks for jumping are included in the price. - There are places to change and lockers to store your things safely! WHERE Jumpsquare Amsterdam Dani√´l Goedkoopstraat 1, 1096 BD Amsterdam Oost (nearby Sparklerweg metro station) TICKETS & AIC Card 11‚Ç¨ if you own an AIC card. If you'd like to get your AIC Card, please click here! Regular ticket is 13.5‚Ç¨ on AIC website or 14.99‚Ç¨ at the door Ticket price includes a special pair of jumping socks Tickets are not refundable (unless you have an **AIC Card**üòé) Tickets are NOT swappable Ready to join? Do you know that AIC has WhatsApp group dedicated to Fitness and Fun? Contact us and send us a request to join the group! IMPORTANT! Description: De jaarlijkse Week van de Circulaire Economie is het grootste landelijke inspiratie- en netwerkevenement voor en door (beginnende) circulaire ondernemers. Een week vol talks, rondleidingen, excursies en workshops door het hele land en natuurlijk  kan en willen wij van De School for Change daar aan bijdragen. Gedurende deze week laten we je proeven van ‚ÄòBuilding for Change‚Äô (11 maart), ‚ÄòFood for Change‚Äô (14 maart) en ‚ÄòEconomics for Change‚Äô (15 maart). Kom je ook? Met je vork kan je de wereld veranderen School for Change organiseert in samenwerking met onze geweldige docenten Femke van den Heuvel en Sheila Struyck een inspirerende en leerzame middag voor iedereen met interesse in de voedseltransitie. Voor iedereen met een duurzaam hart en gevoel voor lekker eten. Iedereen die gelooft dat je met kleine veranderingen ook iets kunt doen op een dagelijkse basis. Thuis en op kantoor. Kom proeven van ‚ÄòFood for Change‚Äô! Na deze middag Over deze middag In vogelvlucht bespreken we de principes, urgentie en tegenwerkingen. En we leggen dit allemaal uit aan de hand van de case study ‚ÄúDe Groene Afslag en haar restaurant en banqueting‚Äù. Tijdens de proeverij aan het einde van de teaser herhalen we aan de hand van het menu nogmaals de gedachten achter elk item op de kaart. Natuurlijk is er daarna tijd om na te praten met een drankje (op eigen kosten) en nog alles te vragen wat je wilt.  Programma ¬† Femke van den Heuvel. Plantbased chef en opleider. van den Heuvel werd tweede in de Europese vegetarische chef verkiezing, had een eigen catering en plantbased opleidingsinstituut. Ze adviseert de beroepsoopleidingen in Nederland die -nu eindelijk- ook een plantbased curriculum aanbieden. Van den Heuvel is wild van in het wild koken, gelooft in werken met wat de natuur ons geeft, maar maakt ook ongelofelijk mooie bordjes.  ¬† Sheila Struyck: Na lang gewerkt te hebben als marketing en transformatie expert in het bedrijfsleven is Struyck nu ‚Äòchef sustainable gastronomy‚Äô. Ze volgde de klassieke chefs opleiding op de Cordon Bleu, maar is sindsdien op een plantforward missie. Voor Food Inspiration schrijft ze over duurzame gastronomie. Niet alleen kan ze je inspireren, maar ook helpen met vraagstukken als leiding geven, motiveren en transfromatie.. Van projectontwikkelaars tot locatie-eigenaren, van vastgoedondernemers tot overheden en van investeerders tot burgers: vandaag beantwoorden we samen de centrale vraag hoe circulair bouwen is te combineren met een gezonde businesscase. 16.30 Borrel met ruimte om informeel na te praten en uit te wisselen (op eigen rekening)
Organizer: School for Change bij De Groene Afslag
Title: Week van de Circulaire Economie - Food for Change
Subtitle: Gratis proeverij van de smaken van de School for Change bij de Groene Afslag: Building, Food en Economics for Change

Description:
Wanneer we hard aan het werk zijn, zijn we ons meestal niet zo bewust van de signalen die ons lichaam ons geeft. Zo kan een werkdag soms zo voorbijvliegen en vergeten we dat we honger hebben, dat we naar het toilet moeten of dat we behoefte hebben aan een pauze; we gaan soms door terwijl we doodmoe zijn. 
 Doordat je constant signalen mist, raak je het contact met jezelf kwijt en ontstaan er vaak lichamelijke klachten zoals moeheid, rugpijn, oorsuizen of hoofdpijn. Wanneer klachten en problemen toenemen kan er minder ruimte komen voor de ontspanning, het plezier en de bevlogenheid waar je op je werk naar streeft. Dat proberen we als mensen op te lossen door nog meer te gaan denken. Maar door nog meer na te denken zal er weinig veranderen. Om het beste uit jezelf te kunnen halen op je werk, maar ook in je priv√©leven, is de verbinding tussen je hoofd en je lijf essentieel.
Title: Professional training: Uit je hoofd, in je lijf
Subtitle: Tijdens deze training leer je de focus naar jouw lichaam te brengen en gedachten vanuit het hoofd los te laten.

Description: The Full Moon is a good time to look at three areas of your life: emotional/spiritual balance, health and career. During that period we might feel some emotions stronger or fuller. This is a perfect way for an overworked body and busy mind to slow down and be at peace. After this session you will leave more serene with a deeper understanding of yourself and be more in touch with your surroundings. For some of the participants it feels like a big weight is taken off their shoulders or the feeling of having been put back into one piece. Some felt the vibrations reached deep inside their body helping to release tension. I have received feedback from the previous groups that it helped them with their clenched jaw, upset stomach, sleeping difficulties and in general it has been described as a very grounding experience. IMPORTANT INFORMATION: - Places are limited - The organizer reserves the right to cancel the event at any time with a full refund - Tickets are non-refundable but you can give away your place to the new owner Sound healing and Sound baths in groups can enable and guide us into a deep trance moment of being. Much akin to lucid dreaming, it is a very present state a right here and now, moving between being firmly grounded yet travelling through the ether like substance of our subconscious. We ourselves as well as everything around us, is at its core in constant vibration. Sound journeys encourage an alignment of these vibrations through self-resonance. It is a re-tuning of our body on a molecular level. Much like waves travelling in a pond of water, sound waves are not only perceived on an auditory level by bringing our ear drums into motion; clear and rhythm frequency modulations encouraged by a medium largely based on water (our bodies) are also perceived on a more subtle level. They reach deep inside moving us on an atomic level. This self-resonance balances our bodies to a natural level, enabling deep states of trance like meditation . They re-tune our own most beautiful instrument, our bodies and minds. They can shake und unblock energetic flows, allowing us to reconnect with ourselves, our ambitions and freeing emotions hidden away in our subconscious. Sound healing, wave by wave brings us closer to that state of calmness and feeling of completeness that every human longs for in their journey of life. One of the big advantages of the session is unlocking a creativity. I treat sound sessions as sound ceremonies. To me it‚Äôs about a unique experience where you are guided by the sound, their vibrations and frequencies. I combine my range of instruments with my voice through singing and chanting. During this session, together with intuitive singing, instruments such as quartz crystal singing bowls, chimes, ocean drum, Shruti box and gong will be played around the body. Vocal exercises will show you the healing power of your own voice. Benefits of Sound Therapy: - Calms the nervous system, - Activates self healing within the body, - Reduces stress, - Promotes a deeper sleep, - Breaks down emotional and physical blockages, - Provides a deep state of relaxation, - Unlocks creativity, - Boosts immunity, - Reduces pain (endorphins release), - Relieves or lessens anxiety and depression. - This workshop is for everyone, no meditation experience necessary. About Agata: Agata is a Sound therapist, Medicine Woman, Ayurvedic massage therapist & Ayurvedic therapist. She is a founder of Agata Wholistic Touch. She was in a 3,5 year training under 2 shamans who help her to expand working with a music as a medicine. She works with voice, body & sound, offering reconnecting with your voice workshops, sound bath sessions and ceremonies (cacao, sacred tobacco rap√© and magic truffles) to the groups, 1-1 and companies. ‚ÄúIn my soul I have always been a musician and an artist. Music has been in my life ever since I remember. This is my second skin that I breathe and dream. It is my personal language and my medicine. Thanks to my shaman teachers from Portugal I have learned over these years how to guide others and help them to connect to their inner selves through music.‚Äù Learn more and connect with Agata on Instagram @agata.wholistic.touch or at www.agata-wholistic-touch.com Cancellation policy: When cancelling:- up to 2 weeks before the event you will be refunded 100% (minus administration costs)- between 1-2 weeks before the session you will be refunded 50% of the full amount.- within 1 week or less until the event I am no longer able to provide a refund.By purchasing the ticket you are agreeing to these conditions.
Title: Full Moon Soothing Sound Bath Journey, Amsterdam West
Subtitle: Sound journey where you can fully immerse into the vibrations of music at the Thursday evening

Description: Meet with like-minded people; locals & internationals, enjoy a glass of authentic Italian wine or a cup of organic tea with bites, and learn painting in a relaxing atmosphere at our professional painting studio in the heart of Amsterdam. -What makes it unique to paint with us: Everyone is welcome; the ones who would like to paint as a hobby, and benefit from the therapeutic side of the painting as well as the ones who would like to become artists and follow the sessions in the long term to learn essential painting techniques. We offer an organic and free space to learn from your own experiences and each other with the guidance of art teachers who have training and long experience in teaching. -What is our concept: You will learn some basic techniques for drawing and painting. The lesson will be tailored to your level and interest. Everyone will get tips and feedback individually. So it‚Äôs suitable for absolute beginners as well as advanced. -What we are going to make: You can work experimental, or abstract, bring examples/photos you wish to paint or reproduce/interpret artworks done by other artists. We have a wide selection of paintings to get inspired for both beginners and advanced. There is more than 50 lessons for each level for different styles. -What is included?All materials, aprons and gloves are included as well as authentic Italian wine (2 glasses), organic tea, coffee and bites. If you cannot make it to this session, there are always upcoming sessions scheduled that you can see on our main page. We will continue organising them on Monday & Thursday evenings throughout the year. It‚Äôs also possible to organise private in-group workshops and team activities at the studio or your place on your desired date & time. The address is De Boomsspijker, Recht Boomssloot 52, 1011 EC Amsterdam, Netherlands. This is not a children¬¥s class. There is easy access is made available in this location for the disabled. Hope to see you there!Contact usPhone: 0031639025919Email: contactartstudioamsterdam@gmail.com Follow the activities of Art Studio Amsterdam: Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/art_studio_amsterdam/ Meetup : https://meetu.ps/c/4xRy7/zhLH7/a Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/artstudioamsterdam/ Website: www.artstudioamsterdam.net (on maintenance) Art Studio Amsterdam is registered at KVK 73923621.

Description: Join us for a brand new comedy night in Amsterdam, where old meets new! Experience the wit and humor of seasoned comedians during our work-in-progress show in the first half, followed by a lineup of fresh talent in our open mic session, after the break. This event takes place in the warm, welcoming and cosy Lellebel, a queer-friendly bar just off the Rembrandtplein. Sit back, relax and enjoy some laughs, whilst sipping on a nice cold beer, or one of Lellebel's delicious cocktails. Entrance is free. Description: Can you remember the first time going out? The thrills of going on a first date or the feeling you had when you were preparing yourself for your first party ever?  Well, here comes our expertise! Welcome to The Amsterdam SurpriseNight Experience. Let us surprise you and give you those thrills of the unknown again! You see, we people are creatures of habits‚Ä¶ Sometimes we just need to step out of those habits, the daily routine, and the same pattern of places we visit. Step out of the ‚Äùknown‚Äù so that you can experience the excitement and spontaneousness of the ‚ÄúUnknown‚Äù again. Choose your desired option(s) and let us surprise you with your nights-out destinations. SurpriseNight Experience - Unique evening Nightlife Experience Enjoy an amazing night out in the sparkling heart of the City! On the start date of your experience, you will receive the details of this adventurous Night-time attraction, where you can expect a great evening out in Amsterdam. The experience will be located in the city center of Amsterdam, so you can easily travel by public transport or take a nice short walk! SurpriseNight Dinner - 3-Course Surprise Dinner Are you in for a surprising, tasteful, relaxing Experience at Amsterdam‚Äôs finest restaurant? Let‚Äôs snazz up your evening with The Amsterdam SupriseNight Dinner! Bring along your date or friends and let us surprise you with your destination. You will be promised a beautiful 3-course menu and of course, you can choose between fish, meat or vegetarian. On the start date of your experience, you will receive the details to prepare yourself for a delicious night out. Bon App√©tit! The Full Experience - luxurious Surprise Hotel + 3-Course Dinner   On the start date of your Experience, You will receive a mail which will include the details of the restaurant where you will enjoy a 3-course Surprise Dinner and the name of the luxurious hotel where you can enjoy a relaxing night of rest. Your hotel and the restaurant will be located in or around the city center of Amsterdam. This will be a surprising, adventurous, mysterious, and delicious Experience in Amsterdam specially composed for you. At the Surprise Dinner restaurant, you can choose between fish, meat or vegetarian. *You can upgrade the 'The Full Experience' with an additional night-time Surprise Experience. Which you visit after you've enjoyed the 3-course dinner. Tip: add the upgrade to make your SupriseNight Experience more complete! Highlights + The most surprising night out in the center of Amsterdam + The included hotels/attractions/restaurants/experiences are always 4/5-stars rated  They all have been reviewed and rated with (very)good or excellent by thousands of previous visitors + Exclusively for you as an Amsterdam Nightlife Member, enjoy! For other great nights out in Amsterdam: Click here
Title: Amsterdam SurpriseNight Experience
Subtitle: When was the last time that you really were surprised?

He has deep insights into human nature, which he uses to help people to solve their business challenges. His analysis and solutions are all based on Emotional Intelligence, not on how we wish humans ought to be, but based on what humans actually are. Managers & Leaders from over 500 organizations across many industries have attended seminars and workshops taught by Coach Michael Lin. Example industries are: - Airports - Automobile Manufacturers - Aviation Companies - Banks & Credit Unions - Casinos - Charities - Churches - Courts (State and County) - Fire, Police & Sheriff Depts - Food Companies - Governments - Hospitals - Hotel Chains - Insurance Companies - Railroad Companies - School Districts - Technology Companies - Universities - Etc Etc. 1: What makes other people tick? Employees who report to us? Our peer managers & leaders? Outside customers? Outside vendors? Shareholders? Upper management? 2: How to identify the right incentives - for other people? Why should we not confuse ‚Äúthe right incentive for ourselves" with "the right incentive for others‚Äù? How to utilize our insights into short term vs long term pain & pleasure to influence, persuade and help others, to create Win/Win outcomes for everyone? 3: How to advance our own careers, by going out of our way to: help others?! solve other people's problems?! Why do we need to understand the big picture of the corporation (not just "my department") and solve problems for the entire corporation? 4: "Software Upgrade" in our heads, from employee thinking (my hours for my salary), into business thinking: what do customers need and want? how to provide goods/services for customers? What hardware & human capabilities do we have? how to inspire employees to want to give their best - using non monetary incentives? How to create win/win for everyone? customers, shareholders, employees, and managers/leaders? 5: Why Confidence Building by practicing Fear Busting is the key to Self Development? You are competing against other employers to attract and keep high quality employees. And your best employees? Description: Do you feel uneasy, when it comes to disciplining and terminating bad employees? Your head says: "This bad employee should be terminated", but you just can't bring yourself to start the disciplinary action? Problems like this will not solve themselves! The more you try to avoid confronting this kind of problems, the more this kind of problems grow and they grow exponentially! The more you try to run away from this kind of problems, the more they chase you!!! "Short term pain but long term pleasure", or, "short term pleasure but long term pain", which one do you want? You will gain: Reality based insights and wisdom, that will solve your real world business problems; You will lose: all your bad employees and the stomach ulcer your bad employees gave you! "It's like I've been cured of cancer! I used to think there is nothing I could do about bad employees - taking this class helped me realize it was those bad employees who put that defeatist idea in my head - for their benefit! I was a victim of their dirty unethical games and I was not even aware of the fact that I was being played!!! You need to take this class and get rid of your cancer cells!" "I used to live in fear of my short term pain, and did not want to deal with my bad employees. I learned from this class: If I don't go thru the short term pain, I will be suffering the long term pain!  And my bad employees can see how I am in fear of the short term pain! I feel so liberated with my new thinking - my old thinking has been a shackle on my mind!" "After taking this class, I added up the total cost of harm my one bad employee was costing us. I almost had a heart attack! You need to take this class and stop the bleeding!" 1: Delegation Skills for Busy Leaders - Why & How 2: How To Motivate & Inspire Your Employees? Young Employees? 3: How to Overcome Employee's Resistance To Change? 4: How to Create Genuine and Sincere Employee Loyalty? 5: How to Manage the 4 Different Types of Younger Employees? 6: How to Successfully Coach Your Employees? 7: Is being friends with your employees a good idea? or a bad idea? 8: How To Get Your Best Employees To Stay For As Long As Possible? 9: How To Avoid Costly Hiring Mistakes? 10: How to Overcome Your Anxiety with Discipline and Termination? 11: Seven Secrets for Your Leadership Success that They Won't Teach You! Thousands of business leaders, from hundreds of organizations and associations, in dozens of industries, have attended his Leadership Seminars, Workshops, Keynote Sessions & 1-on-1 Coaching sessions. His leadership seminar students love his unique teaching content, as well as his unique teaching method. He is the best, at: ‚óè Discovering what is in people's blindspot that is holding them back, causing internal conflicts deep down inside; ‚óè Effectively teaching his students new ways of understanding their situations, therefore helping them to resolve the conflicts in their thinking, so they can become more productive - instantly! +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Coach Michael Lin came out of the tech industry, and uses his superb analytical skills to dissect business challenges. He has deep insights into human nature, which he uses to help people to solve their business challenges. His analysis and solutions are all based on Emotional Intelligence, not on how we wish humans ought to be, but based on what humans actually are. Managers & Leaders from over 500 organizations across many industries have attended seminars and workshops taught by Coach Michael Lin. Example industries are: - Airports - Automobile Manufacturers - Aviation Companies - Banks & Credit Unions - Casinos - Charities - Churches - Courts (State and County) - Fire, Police & Sheriff Depts - Food Companies - Governments - Hospitals - Hotel Chains - Insurance Companies - Railroad Companies - School Districts - Technology Companies - Universities - Etc Etc. 1: What makes other people tick? Employees who report to us? Our peer managers & leaders? Outside customers? Outside vendors? Shareholders? Upper management? 2: How to identify the right incentives - for other people? Why should we not confuse ‚Äúthe right incentive for ourselves" with "the right incentive for others‚Äù? How to utilize our insights into short term vs long term pain & pleasure to influence, persuade and help others, to create Win/Win outcomes for everyone? 3: How to advance our own careers, by going out of our way to: help others?! solve other people's problems?! Why do we need to understand the big picture of the corporation (not just "my department") and solve problems for the entire corporation? 4: "Software Upgrade" in our heads, from employee thinking (my hours for my salary), into business thinking: what do customers need and want? how to provide goods/services for customers? What hardware & human capabilities do we have? how to inspire employees to want to give their best - using non monetary incentives? How to create win/win for everyone? customers, shareholders, employees, and managers/leaders? 5: Why Confidence Building by practicing Fear Busting is the key to Self Development? Description: Before you had employees, all you had to do was to make sure you are a high performer yourself. You know why you wanted to get up early in the morning, fight traffic, and get to work. You now have employees. How do you get other people to want to produce high performance? How do get others to be as eager as you are? Everyone is "uniquely different", with their own set of reasons, their own set of whys: 200 people on the same airplane flying from Los Angeles to New York, they are going from Los Angeles to New York for 200 different reasons! You are going to New York for your own reasons. The other 199 passengers are also going to New York, but they are going for their own reasons. Same trip, same destination, different reasons. In just 1 hour, you will learn the skill to get your employees to Want to do what you Need them to do. This class is "On-Demand". As soon as you register, you will be able to attend the class. There is no need to wait. "I was frustrated when I couldn't get my employees to be as eager as me. After taking this class, I realized: I was trying to project my reasons and my whys onto my employees LOL other people are not me and they have their own reasons and their whys!" "I could not get my employees to tell me what they wanted until I took this class. In this great class, I learned how to set it up so people will always want to volunteer to tell me what I needed to know - I had no idea how easy it can be if you know the right method and my old method was hard work and counterproductive!" "Should've taken this class with Coach Michael Lin 5 years ago when I first had employees. I wish I learned all these secret insights 5 years ago! Don't make my mistake - you need to take this class ASAP!" 1: Delegation Skills for Busy Leaders - Why & How 2: How To Motivate & Inspire Your Employees? Young Employees? 3: How to Overcome Employee's Resistance To Change? 4: How to Create Genuine and Sincere Employee Loyalty? 5: How to Manage the 4 Different Types of Younger Employees? 6: How to Successfully Coach Your Employees? 7: Is being friends with your employees a good idea? or a bad idea? 8: How To Get Your Best Employees To Stay For As Long As Possible? 9: How To Avoid Costly Hiring Mistakes? 10: How to Overcome Your Anxiety with Discipline and Termination? 11: Seven Secrets for Your Leadership Success that They Won't Teach You! Thousands of business leaders, from hundreds of organizations and associations, in dozens of industries, have attended his Leadership Seminars, Workshops, Keynote Sessions & 1-on-1 Coaching sessions. His leadership seminar students love his unique teaching content, as well as his unique teaching method. He is the best, at: ‚óè Discovering what is in people's blindspot that is holding them back, causing internal conflicts deep down inside; ‚óè Effectively teaching his students new ways of understanding their situations, therefore helping them to resolve the conflicts in their thinking, so they can become more productive - instantly! +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Coach Michael Lin came out of the tech industry, and uses his superb analytical skills to dissect business challenges. He has deep insights into human nature, which he uses to help people to solve their business challenges. His analysis and solutions are all based on Emotional Intelligence, not on how we wish humans ought to be, but based on what humans actually are. Managers & Leaders from over 500 organizations across many industries have attended seminars and workshops taught by Coach Michael Lin. Example industries are: - Airports - Automobile Manufacturers - Aviation Companies - Banks & Credit Unions - Casinos - Charities - Churches - Courts (State and County) - Fire, Police & Sheriff Depts - Food Companies - Governments - Hospitals - Hotel Chains - Insurance Companies - Railroad Companies - School Districts - Technology Companies - Universities - Etc Etc. 1: What makes other people tick? Employees who report to us? Our peer managers & leaders? Outside customers? Outside vendors? Shareholders? Upper management? 2: How to identify the right incentives - for other people? Why should we not confuse ‚Äúthe right incentive for ourselves" with "the right incentive for others‚Äù? How to utilize our insights into short term vs long term pain & pleasure to influence, persuade and help others, to create Win/Win outcomes for everyone? 3: How to advance our own careers, by going out of our way to: help others?! solve other people's problems?! Why do we need to understand the big picture of the corporation (not just "my department") and solve problems for the entire corporation? 4: "Software Upgrade" in our heads, from employee thinking (my hours for my salary), into business thinking: what do customers need and want? how to provide goods/services for customers? What hardware & human capabilities do we have? how to inspire employees to want to give their best - using non monetary incentives? How to create win/win for everyone? customers, shareholders, employees, and managers/leaders? 5: Why Confidence Building by practicing Fear Busting is the key to Self Development? How can we constantly expand our comfort zone, by doing things we know we should do, but don't do - due to fear? +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is an Interview/Article by Coach Michael Lin on "Moving From Command & Control to Coaching & Collaboration: How Leaders and Managers Can Become Better Coaches - the Why, the What, and the How": https://medium.com/authority-magazine/moving-from-command-control-to-coaching-collaboration-michael-lin-on-how-leaders-and-managers-64fdf22eaa71 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a list of two dozen people telling us what they thought of the teaching, after they've attended the seminar or workshop by Coach Michael Lin: (These people range from brand new managers to highly experienced leaders, from various private sectors to the government...) https://youtu.be/_jPxflr1LV8 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a short sample of Coach Michael Lin in action, helping managers to get over their fears and grow into Real Leaders, so they can do what they are afraid of doing but need to be doing: https://youtu.be/Wc4GylRBQ6U +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here are over a dozen media interviews, in which Coach Michael Lin answers tough questions from journalists on leadership: https://www.linkedin.com/in/coachmichaellin/recent-activity/videos/ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ We have all attended those waste of time seminars that are: Why bring another one of those waste of time seminars to your company? Description: Did you know, "Not All Millennials are like that!"? As a leadership coach, I've coached and trained 4 different types of Millennials... On a scale from 1 to 10, just exactly how frustrated are you, when it comes to managing millennials on your team? 11? or maybe 12? I am sorry: For your current employees who are millennials: You need to do/learn/hear what is necessary! And what you need to hear (not what you want to hear) are outside of your current awareness, they are outside of your current comfort zone. But you have a long history of expanding your comfort zone, right? You are not the sort of person who spends 100% of their intellectual, mental and emotional energy fighting to stay inside their comfort zone, are you? The type of person who insists on only hearing what they want to hear, and refuses to hear what they need to hear?  What do we call that kind of a person? A "Millennial"? :-) How did this happen? And what can you do to solve your challenge? 1. Exactly what is the pack of lies that were told to millennials; (No, it's not what you think.) 2. Who told this pack of lies, and what were their motives; (No, it's not who you think, and it's not what you think.) 3. What is the truth that millennials need to hear. (No, it's not what you think.) 4. What is the truth that you need to hear? As we say in Chinese: "Good medicine tastes bitter, honest advice sounds harsh to your ears." You already know "The Truth Shall Set You Free", but the truth will hurt your feelings first :-)  5. Why "Appeasement" is a really really bad policy, that will only turn you into an "Enabler", and harm everyone: your employees, the business, society at large and yourself. (Remember Neville Chamberlain and his disastrous policy of Appeasement?) 6. Why you must watch out for those who are trying to drive a wedge between employees and employers, or pit employees and employers against each other, instead of creating win/win situations for everyone. 7. How to figure out who need to be fired, and why you are actually harming them if you don't terminate them; 8. How to overcome your feeling of uneasiness to fire those who need to be fired, and why you are actually truly helping them by terminating them; 9. Who can be coached, and how to coach Millennials? And most importantly, you will learn how to establish a whole new narrative, how to present and control a new frame, so instead of you having to constantly appease, supplicate, pamper, and seeking approval from your bad employees with bad attitudes, you have the opposite: This class is ONLY for those managers who want to expand their own comfort zones, hear the truth, willing to do what has to be done, and want to overcome this challenge. You are busy, that's why this class is "On-demand"! As soon as you register, you'll be able to take the class! Description: In the year 1573 an epic battle took place around the city of Haarlem. Take on the role of Kenau, a resistance fighter who lived between 1526 and 1588 and help defend the city against the Spaniards. Your story starts at one of the oldest stations in the Netherlands and ends at the big square in the center of Haarlem. On the way you will visit the Amsterdamse poort, the Frans Hals museum, the st. Bavo church and the archaeological museum. Are you ready to defend Haarlem? The route you‚Äôre going to follow in the city is sprinkled with unique places, fun clues and challenges, and incredible stories. The experience will play out like you‚Äôre the main characters of a movie, only that you‚Äôre experiencing everything in first person! Fun dialogue, intrigue, and unexpected interactions are guaranteed. HOW IT WORKS‚ùì 1. Book your tickets üé´ 2. Download the Questo app - it's free üì≤ 3. Head to the starting pointüìç WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DO The game is an interactive activity where you are guided by a mobile app through the city. With it, you follow directions and solve very fun puzzles, riddles, and cryptic codes. During the game, you will also visit popular and hidden places in the city while learning fun (and we mean it) stories about them. This is a storytelling experience just as much. The people doing these city exploration games gave them an average rating of 4.7/5 around the world. Join the playground too! ------------------ More about Questo üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Questo is an urban entertainment platform offering thematic real-world exploration games. It is currently available in over 150 cities üåé and has entertained hundreds of thousands of players already. As of today, the app offers more than 400 different experiences created by a growing network of local content creators and event organizers.
Title: The Battle for Haarlem: Outdoor Escape Game
Subtitle: Embark on a thrilling adventure as you follow clues, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover hidden gems in the city.

Refund_Policy: Neem contact op met de organisator om een restitutie aan te vragen.
Description: Voor een bezoek aan de grootste visafslag van Nederland moet je vroeg opstaan, maar dat is het meer dan waard. In de visafslag aan de Halkade worden grote hoeveelheden platvis (schol, tong, tarbot, schar, griet) en rondvis (kabeljauw en wijting) vers aangevoerd, gesorteerd en verkoopgereed gemaakt. Onder leiding van Jan Zwanenburg wordt het hele proces van het lossen van de kotters, via de sorteerhal naar de mijnhal doorlopen.¬†Een unieke ervaring die je niet snel vergeet. ¬∑ De rondleiding is niet geschikt voor jonge kinderen; ¬∑ Bij de visafslag aan de Halkade 80 in IJmuiden is voldoende (gratis) parkeergelegenheid aan het begin van de Halkade. De ingang van de visafslag is aan het parkeerterrein bij het bord 'Hollandse Visveiling IJmuiden';  ¬∑ De visafslag is tijdens de rondleiding volop in bedrijf, wees voorzichtig en volg de aanwijzingen van Jan. Deelname is op eigen risico; ¬∑ In de vishal wordt ook met ijs en bevroren producten gewerkt, dus is er een lage temperatuur;
Title: Rondleiding Visafslag IJmuiden
Subtitle: Het is vroeg, maar dan krijg je wel een geweldige rondleiding over de visafslag IJmuiden wanneer deze volop in bedrijf is.

Refund_Policy: Neem contact op met de organisator om een restitutie aan te vragen.
Description: Inner Guidance | Rebalancing Massage Door je drukke en veeleisende leven vergeet je te letten op signalen vanuit je lichaam. Je hoofd draait overuren en je zorgt beter voor anderen dan voor jezelf. Onbewust vragen we veel van ons lichaam. Aandacht voor je hoofd √©n lichaam We proberen onszelf vooral via ons hoofd te begrijpen en te veranderen. Echter weet je hoofd niet altijd wat het beste is voor jou als geheel. Lichaamswerk voegt jouw eigen lichaam toe als waardevolle ingang om jezelf op een diepere laag te leren kennen. Los van overtuigingen, patronen, herinneringen en oordeel. Door liefdevolle, aandachtige aanraking kom je uit je hoofd en maak je ruimte om de wijsheid van je eigen lichaam te voelen. Want daar mag je op vertrouwen. Een aanraking die je leven veranderd. Bewustwording en groei De basis van mijn lichaamsgerichte & intu√Øtieve werkwijze is mijn passie om anderen te begeleiden het leven te gaan leven dat in de kern bij ze past. Door aandachtig te kijken naar de relatie die je met jezelf en je lichaam hebt wordt inzichtelijk welke patronen je in de weg staan om echt voor jezelf te kiezen en te herkennen wat je batterij leegzuigt. Ik weet precies hoe dit voelt en door hiermee aan de slag te gaan (met professionele hulp), heb ik deze patronen kunnen herkennen en doorvoelen. En daar pluk ik nog iedere dag de vruchten van. Het heeft ervoor gezorgd dat ik weer aan het roer sta van mijn leven. Ik word niet geleefd door wat me overkomt, maar ik bepaal de richting die bij mij past en maak bewuste keuzes waar ik mijn energie op richt. En dat gun ik jou ook! Graag wil ik je uitnodigen voor een 1:1 sessie Inner Guidance of Rebalancing Massage in mijn praktijk aan huis. Je gaat naar huis met rust in je hoofd en concrete tools & tips die je zullen helpen in je dagelijkse leven meer te ontspannen. --> Inner GuidanceIntu√Øtieve sessie gericht op jouw thema/vraag (relatie, werk, 'stress'klachten) --> Rebalancing massageLuisteren naar wat je lichaam je te vertellen heeft (meditatie, zelfonderzoek, aanraking) Locatie: Wilgenkade 2, 2461NN, Langeraar (Ter Aar) Voel je een ja? Selecteer hiernaast de datum en tijd dat het jou uitkomt en maak direct een afspraak. Ik zie er naar uit om je te ontmoeten. Liefs, Anne Marieke BaaijensRebalancer & Intu√Øtief Coach www.mydept.nl | 06 28 666 783 | info@mydept.nl
Title: Uit je hoofd, in je lijf
Subtitle: 1:1 sessie door Anne Marieke

Refund_Policy: No Refunds
Description: üåü Are you ready to embark on a thrilling journey of self-discovery and personal branding? üåü In a world where everything is a brand, your personal brand stands out as the most authentic expression of who you are and the unique value you bring to the world. It's about believing in your abilities, showcasing your strengths, and living authentically in every action you take. Join us for an exclusive workshop, "Everything Is a Brand, Even You!", where you'll dive deep into the art of personal branding with the guidance of Michel van Velde, an expert renowned for his ability to uncover your intrinsic strengths and craft a compelling narrative around them. Michel's approach is not just about standing out; it's about standing true to who you are, boldly and authentically. Why You Should Attend: Don't Miss This Unique Opportunity! Whether you're just starting to think about your personal brand or looking to refine and express it more authentically, this workshop is your stepping stone to realizing your full potential. Spaces are limited, so secure your spot now and take the first step towards unleashing the true power of your personal brand. üåà Ready to believe in the value you bring and show up authentically in everything you do? Join us, and let's make your personal brand shine! üåà Agenda: 17:15 - 17:30: Walk-in and get comfortable 17:30 - 19:30: Workshop begins! 19:30 - later: "After Party" Drinks (at you own costs) at Villa Orlof! ü•Ç Stay connected üìßWe would like to keep you updated through our (bi-monthly) newsletter. Please click here if you want to receive our latest news in your mailbox. About The Speaker: Michel van Velde is the CEO and founder of Craftmore, a creative digital studio that shapes and executes clients strategic, branding, creative and digital needs. In 2006 he started a creative digital agency called One Shoe which he successfully grew to 50 employees and sold in 2020. One Shoe won over 50 awards and was responsible for brands and websites like DHL parcel, Thuisarts, Damen Shipyards, Kanker.nl, Go-Tan and creative campaigns for Nike, SOS children's villages, Go-Tan, ING and Makelaarsland. Special Thanks to UtrechtInc:  We're thrilled to host this transformative workshop in UtrechtInc's vibrant space, known for catalyzing creativity and entrepreneurship. Their support enables us to provide an environment that's not just about learning, but about experiencing and growing together. Note:
Title: Everything Is a Brand, Even You! ‚Äì Unleash Your Authentic Personal Brand
Subtitle: Embark on a thrilling journey of self-discovery and personal branding with the brand expert, Michel van Velde.

Description: 'GrowthCLUB', het evenement voor kwartaalplanning en interactie met collega ondernemers.  Je duikt een dag de diepte in en je vertrekt met: GrowthCLUB is jouw kans om even van een afstand naar jouw bedrijf te kijken en weer focus aan te brengen. Samen met jou maken we een succesplan voor de komende 90 dagen. Jij en je team keren getraind en met bewezen strategie√´n terug naar je bedrijf. Om met een helder doel voor ogen en nieuwe inzichten en middelen samen aan de slag te gaan om jouw doelen sneller te bereiken. Het is een totaal verzorgde dag inclusief lunch en borrel gericht op het maken van de kwartaalplanning voor jou bedrijf. Daarnaast gaan we elke keer in op een interessant topic voor MKB-ondernemers. Op 14 maart sluit  Annegees van Linge  aan als gastspreker met een workshop "Storytelling: Maak impact met jouw verhaal".  GrowthCLUB in Woerden is een event van Marleen van Dam, Sipko Visser en Mignon Marseille.
Title: GrowthCLUB - Plan je groei per kwartaal
Subtitle: Samen met mede MKB- ondernemers ga je, begeleid door 3 coaches, aan de slag met nuttige en praktische concepten voor j√≥u kwartaalplanning.

Description: Did you know, "Not All Millennials are like that!"? As a leadership coach, I've coached and trained 4 different types of Millennials... On a scale from 1 to 10, just exactly how frustrated are you, when it comes to managing millennials on your team? 11? or maybe 12? I am sorry: For your current employees who are millennials: You need to do/learn/hear what is necessary! And what you need to hear (not what you want to hear) are outside of your current awareness, they are outside of your current comfort zone. But you have a long history of expanding your comfort zone, right? You are not the sort of person who spends 100% of their intellectual, mental and emotional energy fighting to stay inside their comfort zone, are you? The type of person who insists on only hearing what they want to hear, and refuses to hear what they need to hear?  What do we call that kind of a person? A "Millennial"? :-) How did this happen? And what can you do to solve your challenge? 1. Exactly what is the pack of lies that were told to millennials; (No, it's not what you think.) 2. Who told this pack of lies, and what were their motives; (No, it's not who you think, and it's not what you think.) 3. What is the truth that millennials need to hear. (No, it's not what you think.) 4. What is the truth that you need to hear? As we say in Chinese: "Good medicine tastes bitter, honest advice sounds harsh to your ears." You already know "The Truth Shall Set You Free", but the truth will hurt your feelings first :-)  5. Why "Appeasement" is a really really bad policy, that will only turn you into an "Enabler", and harm everyone: your employees, the business, society at large and yourself. (Remember Neville Chamberlain and his disastrous policy of Appeasement?) 6. Why you must watch out for those who are trying to drive a wedge between employees and employers, or pit employees and employers against each other, instead of creating win/win situations for everyone. 7. How to figure out who need to be fired, and why you are actually harming them if you don't terminate them; 8. How to overcome your feeling of uneasiness to fire those who need to be fired, and why you are actually truly helping them by terminating them; 9. Who can be coached, and how to coach Millennials? And most importantly, you will learn how to establish a whole new narrative, how to present and control a new frame, so instead of you having to constantly appease, supplicate, pamper, and seeking approval from your bad employees with bad attitudes, you have the opposite: This class is ONLY for those managers who want to expand their own comfort zones, hear the truth, willing to do what has to be done, and want to overcome this challenge. Your business competitors are not only working on stealing your customers away from you, they are also working on stealing your best employees from you. You are competing against other employers to attract and keep high quality employees. And your best employees? In this knowledge based economy, best employees know the key to their own long term well-being is their own skill set. They are hungry for knowledge, for wisdom, they want what's in your head, and they want you to make their learning experience inspirational not painful. If you refuse to teach them, if you are not effective at coaching, or if it's unpleasant to learn under you (you are a typical tyrant of a boss from 1950 LOL) they will quit and go somewhere else for the learning experience. Description: Hatha yoga is de meest klassieke vorm van yoga. Hatha yoga werd vroeger beoefend door monniken die milde lichaamsbeweging nodig hadden naast het vele mediteren (en als voorbereiding op het mediteren). De yogahoudingen van hatha yoga houd je langer vast, zonder dat het oncomfortabel wordt.Spanningen verdwijnen hierdoor uit het lichaam, waardoor je tijdens de meditatie ook langer en comfortabeler kunt zitten. Je bent je met deze yogastijl dus ultiem aan het voorbereiden op je meditatie. Maar hatha yoga is meer dan alleen bewegen en de yogahoudingen goed uitvoeren. Want juist de verbinding tussen lichaam en geest is heel belangrijk binnen deze stijl. Ha-Tha betekent zon en maan, welke binnen de yoga gezien worden als tegenstrijdigheden.De zon staat namelijk voor actie, vurig en mannelijk. De maan staat voor verinnerlijking, kalmerend en vrouwelijk. Binnen hatha komen de kenmerken van de zon en de maan samen. ************************************************************************** Yoga, meditatieles, en Pilates doe je bij stichting !Triggr met een geldig abonnement. Description: Yin yoga Yin yoga is een zachte, langzame, meditatieve vorm van yoga. Houdingen worden voor langere tijd vastgehouden, meestal 3-5 minuten, maar het kan zelfs nog langer. Hierdoor ontstaat er een (lichte) weerstand in de gebieden waarvoor de houding bedoeld is. De spieren ontspannen zoveel mogelijk, mede met behulp van props om het lichaam te ondersteunen. Door deze lange duur en ontspanning treedt er effect op in de dieperliggende delen van het lichaam en wordt het bindweefsel gestimuleerd, dat zich bevindt rondom bv. spieren en gewrichten. Als je weer uit de houding komt is het tijd om na te voelen wat een houding met je lichaam gedaan heeft. De drie hoofdprincipes. Je komt in een houding en voelt je eerste grens. Waar kun je blijven voor een aantal minuten? Je wordt stil. Om door te dringen tot de weefsels die dieper in je lichaam liggen word je stil en houd je de spieren zacht. Je houdt de houding voor langere tijd vast, zodat je weefsels de tijd krijgen en je kunt observeren wat zich aandient. Waar is yin yoga goed voor? Een yin yogales is dus goed voor gewrichten, bindweefsel, ligamenten en botten, en kalmeert het zenuwstelsel. Yin yoga stimuleert ook je energetische lichaam, doordat bepaalde meridianen worden gestimuleerd in de houdingen. Yin yoga is een fantastische vorm van yoga als tegenhanger van de drukte die we allemaal dagelijks ervaren. Doordat een houding voor langere tijd wordt aangehouden is er tijd om grenzen te ontdekken, stil te worden en dieper te voelen wat er is in het lichaam. Er is focus op mindfulness en ademhaling in de houdingen, waardoor enige opgekomen weerstand geobserveerd kan worden. De stilte en zachtheid kunnen je dus heel erg bij jezelf brengen en je hebt tijd om te zien welke inzichten er soms naar boven komen. Tijd om te oefenen met compassie voor jezelf en jouw proces. Tijd om te luisteren naar jouw lichaam en naar wat het nodig heeft. Hoewel het een zachte en langzame vorm van yoga is betekent dit niet dat het ook altijd gemakkelijk is. Het is bij deze vorm van yoga erg belangrijk dat je de grenzen van je eigen kunnen in de gaten houdt. ************************************************************************** Yoga, meditatieles, Tai Chi en Pilates doe je bij stichting !Triggr met een geldig abonnement. Het is een gecombineerd abonnement voor alle vormen yoga, Tai Chi en Pilates die !Triggr aanbiedt. Description: Klassiek Pilates volgt d√© traditionele bewegingsmethode ontwikkeld door Joseph Pilates. (1883 ‚Äì 1967), een gedreven en briljant docent, die zijn methode ‚ÄúThe Art of Contrology‚Äù noemde. Contrology is de algehele co√∂rdinatie van lichaam en geest. De methode focust op de dieper liggende spieren in het lichaam, op concentratie en op ademhaling. Het versterkt de spieren in het hele lichaam en maakt het lichaam soepel en lenig door middel van een serie vloeiende, dynamische bewegingen. Ook de kleine spieren worden getraind, en juist deze spieren zorgen voor een sterke fundering van het lichaam en, daarmee, voor een goede houding. Zonder dat je er bewust van bent ga je rechter zitten en lopen, gracieuzer bewegen en zal je beter slapen. Het gaat bij de bewegingen om kwaliteit, uitgevoerd met precisie en controle in combinatie met de juiste ademhaling. Dit verbetert de kracht, balans en lenigheid van het lichaam; Juist d√©ze methode geeft heel snel resultaat. De meest bekende studio‚Äôs over de hele wereld allemaal werken allemaal volgens deze methode. ************************************************************************** Yoga, meditatieles, en Pilates doe je bij stichting !Triggr met een geldig abonnement. Description: Stoelyogalessen Stoelyoga is voor iedereen!Maar is ook geschikt voor de volgende doelgroepen: * Ouderen * Mensen slecht ter been * Mensen met een fysieke beperking * Mensen met een kantoorbaan * Mensen die veel computerwerk doen en mensen met een zittend beroep * Mensen met nek- en schouderklachten Stoelyoga doe je op een stoel. Indien je oefeningen staand doet, kun je de stoel vasthouden. De oefeningen die je doet met stoelyoga zijn onder andere de volgende: oefeningen voor schouders, nek, vingers, borst en bovenrug. De spieren en alle gewrichten komen aan bod (enkels, knie√´n, heupen, bekken, schouders en de gehele wervelkolom), indien het mogelijk is.Een stoelyogales bestaat uit het uitvoeren van milde yogahoudingen op een stoel. Dat kan op een offici√´le yogastoel, bureaustoel, leunstoel, vliegtuigstoel of rolstoel, het maakt niet uit! Stoelyoga is een rustige yoga-/bewegingsvorm en daardoor voor iedereen haalbaar, ongeacht leeftijd, omvang, lenigheid of conditie. Een yogales is erop gericht spieren en gewrichten soepeler te maken. Je leert spanning los te laten en je concentratie en motoriek te verbeteren. Tijdens de lessen staat het respecteren van je eigen mogelijkheden centraal en leer je creatief om te gaan met eventuele beperkingen.Ontspannen en genieten staan voorop en belangrijk om te onthouden: al zijn de bewegingen nog zo klein, je lichamelijke en geestelijke gezondheid zal vooruit gaan bij regelmatige beoefening. ************************************************************************** Yoga, meditatieles, en Pilates doe je bij stichting !Triggr met een geldig abonnement. Description: A man‚Äôs true wealth is the good he does in the world - kahlil gibran Wil jij met jouw liefde de wereld om je heen mooier maken? Description: ViaJacobi organiseert elke donderdag een Vesper; een moment van bezinnen en ontmoeten. Schuif aan bij een eenvoudige maaltijd en doe daarna mee met de Vesper. Samen luiden we de avond in en nemen we de tijd om te verstillen, na een dag vol indrukken. Voor wie zijn de Vespers bedoeld? Voor iedereen! Of je nu bekend bent met het christelijk geloof, of dat je hier weinig of niets mee hebt, je bent van harte welkom! De maaltijd begint om 18.30 in de Jacobikerk (de Pelgrimszaal). De Vesper zal daarna plaatsvinden in het Zuiderkoor van de kerk, van 19.15 - 19.45 uur. Meld je hier aan om mee te kunnen eten! Er zijn alleen donatietickets beschikbaar; draag bij naar draagkracht!

Description: ‚ÄòDinner and a movie‚Äô is so 2021! Especially when the movie is now played out in the real-world. Let us explain! We‚Äôre inviting you both (or you three - hey, we don‚Äôt judge) to do one of the adventure-themed open-air escape games in Utrecht. The route you‚Äôre going to follow in the city is sprinkled with charming and picturesque places, fun clues and challenges, and unique stories of past and present. The experience will play out like you‚Äôre the main characters of a movie, only that you‚Äôre experiencing everything in first person! Fun dialogue, intrigue, and unexpected interactions are guaranteed. Play a city game and go on a Utrecht walking tour where you will follow clues to discover amazing places and local stories. On this Utrecht tour and city game, you will walk around town in search of a monster and you will visit top Utrecht attractions like Museum Speelklok, De Letters van Utrecht, Domtoren and many more. Are you up for an adventure in Utrecht? Full flexibility: start at any hour, take a break at any time and resume later This is always available. It's 24/7, every day of the week. This is the safest event you can book: private, no human contact, you will avoid crowds. Play offline: you DON'T NEED an internet connection to play this city game. HOW IT WORKS‚ùì 1. Book your tickets üé´ 2. Download the Questo app - it's free üì≤ 3. Head to the starting pointüìç WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DO  The game is an interactive activity where you are guided by a mobile app through the city. With it, you follow directions and solve very fun puzzles, riddles, and cryptic codes. During the game, you will also visit popular and hidden places in the city while learning fun (and we mean it) stories about them. This is a storytelling experience just as much. The people doing these city exploration games gave them an average rating of 4.7/5 around the world. Join the playground too! ------------------ More about Questo üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Questo is an urban entertainment platform offering thematic real-world exploration games. It is currently available in over 130 cities üåé and has entertained hundreds of thousands of players already. As of today, the app offers more than 300 different experiences created by a growing network of local content creators and event organizers.
Title: Unexpected Utrecht - Outdoor Escape Game
Subtitle: If you‚Äôre looking for a new and exciting way of spending time with your one and only, family or friends, this is your Eureka moment!

Description: Energetische Healing & Reading 20 min ‚Ç¨ 15,- Tijdens de energetische healing mag je plaats nemen op een stoel en hoef je even helemaal niets. Je kunt met en zonder vraag bij mij terecht. Ik ga (met jouw toestemming) kijken naar je energie en of er dingen zijn die je wilt aanpassen, loslaten of bijstellen. Je energie wordt hierbij opgeschoond en gezuiverd. Vaak komt er hierbij een (levens)thema naar voren en wordt er vanuit jouw wezen ruimte voor ontwikkeling gecre√´erd. Droomconsult 20 min ‚Ç¨ 15,- Tijdens een droomconsult gaan we aan de slag met je droom en gaan we samen onderzoeken wat deze droom voor jou betekent, de vragen en thema‚Äôs die de droom oproept en hoe je ernaar kunt handelen in je dagelijks leven. Het kan zijn dat het droomonderzoek om meer tijd vraagt, of dat je zelf nog meer vragen beantwoord wilt hebben. Bij elke verlenging van het consult (in overeenstemming met jou) vraag ik ‚Ç¨15,00 euro extra, voor 15 minuten. Contact Mocht je vragen hebben over dromen, healing of hulp nodig hebben bij een vraagstuk dan kun je me bereiken via onderstaande gegevens.
Title: Droomconsult/ Healing & Reading @ Ananda Utrecht
Subtitle: Heb je een vraag omtrent je dromen, of loop je vast en wil je een healing en reading ontvangen? Kom dan langs!

Description: After you take the class, you will figure out: Why it's impossible for them to teach you these secrets This class is ONLY for those managers who want to expand their own comfort zones, hear the truth, willing to do what has to be done, and want to overcome this challenge. You need to do/learn/hear what is necessary! And what you need to hear (not what you want to hear) are outside of your current awareness, they are outside of your current comfort zone. But you have a long history of expanding your comfort zone, right? You are not the sort of person who spends 100% of their intellectual, mental and emotional energy fighting to stay inside their comfort zone, are you? The type of person who insists on only hearing what they want to hear, and refuses to hear what they need to hear?  You are busy, that's why this class is "On-demand"! As soon as you register, you'll be able to take the class! Or come back to the class if you get interrupted! 1: Delegation Skills for Busy Leaders - Why & How 2: How To Motivate & Inspire Your Employees? Young Employees? 3: How to Overcome Employee's Resistance To Change? 4: How to Create Genuine and Sincere Employee Loyalty? 5: How to Manage the 4 Different Types of Younger Employees? 6: How to Successfully Coach Your Employees? 7: Is being friends with your employees a good idea? or a bad idea? 8: How To Get Your Best Employees To Stay For As Long As Possible? 9: How To Avoid Costly Hiring Mistakes? 10: How to Overcome Your Anxiety with Discipline and Termination? 11: Seven Secrets for Your Leadership Success that They Won't Teach You! Thousands of business leaders, from hundreds of organizations and associations, in dozens of industries, have attended his Leadership Seminars, Workshops, Keynote Sessions & 1-on-1 Coaching sessions. His leadership seminar students love his unique teaching content, as well as his unique teaching method. He is the best, at: ‚óè Discovering what is in people's blindspot that is holding them back, causing internal conflicts deep down inside; ‚óè Effectively teaching his students new ways of understanding their situations, therefore helping them to resolve the conflicts in their thinking, so they can become more productive - instantly! +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Coach Michael Lin came out of the tech industry, and uses his superb analytical skills to dissect business challenges. He has deep insights into human nature, which he uses to help people to solve their business challenges. His analysis and solutions are all based on Emotional Intelligence, not on how we wish humans ought to be, but based on what humans actually are. Managers & Leaders from over 500 organizations across many industries have attended seminars and workshops taught by Coach Michael Lin. Example industries are: - Airports - Automobile Manufacturers - Aviation Companies - Banks & Credit Unions - Casinos - Charities - Churches - Courts (State and County) - Fire, Police & Sheriff Depts - Food Companies - Governments - Hospitals - Hotel Chains - Insurance Companies - Railroad Companies - School Districts - Technology Companies - Universities - Etc Etc. 1: What makes other people tick? Employees who report to us? Our peer managers & leaders? Outside customers? Outside vendors? Shareholders? Upper management? 2: How to identify the right incentives - for other people? Why should we not confuse ‚Äúthe right incentive for ourselves" with "the right incentive for others‚Äù? How to utilize our insights into short term vs long term pain & pleasure to influence, persuade and help others, to create Win/Win outcomes for everyone? 3: How to advance our own careers, by going out of our way to: help others?! solve other people's problems?! Why do we need to understand the big picture of the corporation (not just "my department") and solve problems for the entire corporation? 4: "Software Upgrade" in our heads, from employee thinking (my hours for my salary), into business thinking: what do customers need and want? how to provide goods/services for customers? What hardware & human capabilities do we have? how to inspire employees to want to give their best - using non monetary incentives? How to create win/win for everyone? customers, shareholders, employees, and managers/leaders? 5: Why Confidence Building by practicing Fear Busting is the key to Self Development? How can we constantly expand our comfort zone, by doing things we know we should do, but don't do - due to fear? +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is an Interview/Article by Coach Michael Lin on "Moving From Command & Control to Coaching & Collaboration: How Leaders and Managers Can Become Better Coaches - the Why, the What, and the How": https://medium.com/authority-magazine/moving-from-command-control-to-coaching-collaboration-michael-lin-on-how-leaders-and-managers-64fdf22eaa71 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a list of two dozen people telling us what they thought of the teaching, after they've attended the seminar or workshop by Coach Michael Lin: (These people range from brand new managers to highly experienced leaders, from various private sectors to the government...) https://youtu.be/_jPxflr1LV8 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a short sample of Coach Michael Lin in action, helping managers to get over their fears and grow into Real Leaders, so they can do what they are afraid of doing but need to be doing: https://youtu.be/Wc4GylRBQ6U +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here are over a dozen media interviews, in which Coach Michael Lin answers tough questions from journalists on leadership: https://www.linkedin.com/in/coachmichaellin/recent-activity/videos/ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ We have all attended those waste of time seminars that are: Why bring another one of those waste of time seminars to your company? And force employees to endure the ordeal? Be a real hero, bring a seminar that your employees will: And when leaders improve? everyone in the company gets to enjoy the benefit: from team members to shareholders! And all of them will be thanking you for organizing training that's useful!
Title: Utrecht Leadership Secret: 7 Secrets for Your Success They Won't Teach You!
Subtitle: If you want others to give you fish, this class is NOT for you. If you want to learn how to fish on your own, this class is for you!

Description: Before you had employees, all you had to do was to make sure you are a high performer yourself. You know why you wanted to get up early in the morning, fight traffic, and get to work. You now have employees, Millennial Employees! How do you get other people to want to produce high performance? How do get others to be as eager as you are? Everyone is "uniquely different", with their own set of reasons, their own set of whys: 200 people on the same airplane flying from Los Angeles to New York, they are going from Los Angeles to New York for 200 different reasons! You are going to New York for your own reasons. The other 199 passengers are also going to New York, but they are going for their own reasons. Same trip, same destination, different reasons. In just 1 hour, you will learn the skill to get your employees to Want to do what you Need them to do. This class is "On-Demand". As soon as you register, you will be able to attend the class. There is no need to wait. "I was frustrated when I couldn't get my employees to be as eager as me. After taking this class, I realized: I was trying to project my reasons and my whys onto my employees LOL other people are not me and they have their own reasons and their whys!" "I could not get my employees to tell me what they wanted until I took this class. In this great class, I learned how to set it up so people will always want to volunteer to tell me what I needed to know - I had no idea how easy it can be if you know the right method and my old method was hard work and counterproductive!" "Should've taken this class with Coach Michael Lin 5 years ago when I first had employees. I wish I learned all these secret insights 5 years ago! Description: Did you know, "Not All Millennials are like that!"? As a leadership coach, I've coached and trained 4 different types of Millennials... On a scale from 1 to 10, just exactly how frustrated are you, when it comes to managing millennials on your team? 11? or maybe 12? I am sorry: For your current employees who are millennials: You need to do/learn/hear what is necessary! And what you need to hear (not what you want to hear) are outside of your current awareness, they are outside of your current comfort zone. But you have a long history of expanding your comfort zone, right? You are not the sort of person who spends 100% of their intellectual, mental and emotional energy fighting to stay inside their comfort zone, are you? The type of person who insists on only hearing what they want to hear, and refuses to hear what they need to hear?  What do we call that kind of a person? A "Millennial"? :-) How did this happen? And what can you do to solve your challenge? 1. Exactly what is the pack of lies that were told to millennials; (No, it's not what you think.) 2. Who told this pack of lies, and what were their motives; (No, it's not who you think, and it's not what you think.) 3. What is the truth that millennials need to hear. (No, it's not what you think.) 4. What is the truth that you need to hear? As we say in Chinese: "Good medicine tastes bitter, honest advice sounds harsh to your ears." You already know "The Truth Shall Set You Free", but the truth will hurt your feelings first :-)  5. Why "Appeasement" is a really really bad policy, that will only turn you into an "Enabler", and harm everyone: your employees, the business, society at large and yourself. (Remember Neville Chamberlain and his disastrous policy of Appeasement?) 6. Why you must watch out for those who are trying to drive a wedge between employees and employers, or pit employees and employers against each other, instead of creating win/win situations for everyone. 7. How to figure out who need to be fired, and why you are actually harming them if you don't terminate them; 8. How to overcome your feeling of uneasiness to fire those who need to be fired, and why you are actually truly helping them by terminating them; 9. Who can be coached, and how to coach Millennials? And most importantly, you will learn how to establish a whole new narrative, how to present and control a new frame, so instead of you having to constantly appease, supplicate, pamper, and seeking approval from your bad employees with bad attitudes, you have the opposite: This class is ONLY for those managers who want to expand their own comfort zones, hear the truth, willing to do what has to be done, and want to overcome this challenge. The Creative Workforce Summit is er om je te inspireren met nieuwe inzichten, bruikbare tools en toepasbare cheatcodes zodat je zelf ook in lightspeed vooruit kan.  Samen cre√´ren we een experience waarbij je meer leert over belangrijke thema‚Äôs als the future of work, werknemers 2.0, craftmanship,  nieuwe vormen van content cre√´ren en next level community building. Ook zoomen we in op de wereld van innovatie en slimmer (samen)werken. Dit event is voor elke creative, werknemer, freelancer, ondernemer, manager of nieuwsgierig mens met knaldrang. Alle talks zijn in het Nederlands.  PÔªørogramma in agenda LÔªøocaties: Skybox, A'DAM&Co. Datum: 26 september 2023 A‚ÄôDAM Toren  Door: Skybox, Vacature Via, A'DAM&Co., The Freelance Qommunity, Adformatie  PÔªøartner: Bluelance Tijd: 16:00 - 22:00 (CEST) Adres: 1 Overhoeksplein, 1031 KS Amsterdam
Title: The Creative Workforce Summit 2023
Subtitle:
The Creative Workforce Summit 2023. Discover the future of work.
By Skybox, Vacature Via  A'DAM&Co, Adformatie, The Freelance Qommunity

Description: Dive into the vibrant world of painting with this upcoming Contemporary Painting Course, designed to inspire both new and seasoned artists. This unique course extends beyond traditional boundaries, embracing a wide spectrum of contemporary painting styles and techniques. For 3 weeks, every Thursday evening from 19:30 to 22:00 throughout March.The course is held in my personal studio, offering an intimate setting conducive to creativity and personal interaction. Limited to just max. 5 participants, this ensures individual attention and guidance. Course Overview: This course is a celebration of creativity, offering a platform for participants to explore and develop their personal style in painting. Unlike conventional art classes, I treat every participant as a professional artist, encouraging a deep dive into the joy of creation. The course is structured to allow 1.5 - 2 hours of individual painting, supported by personal guidance from a professional artist. This hands-on approach ensures that each participant receives tailored advice and encouragement to bring out their unique voice and style. What to Expect: Course Philosophy: This course is for those seeking to explore the depths of contemporary painting without the constraints of traditional art education. It's about breaking free from fear, embracing the process, celebrating imperfection and learning from group discussing how the perception of others of your work can totally differ from your own. My aim is to create a supportive and intimate environment where creativity flows freely, and every artist, regardless of their level, can find joy and fulfilment in their work. Practical Details: Join us for this course about contemporary painting, where you'll not only learn about different styles and techniques but also discover your own artistic voice. Whether you're just starting out or looking to deepen your practice, this course offers a path to genuine self-expression and artistic growth.
Title: CONTEMPORARY PAINTING COURSE @ TREEHOUSE NDSM
Subtitle: A weekly Painting Course focussing on Contemporary Painting @ Treehouse NDSM, every Thursday from 19:30-22:00! :)
